short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Regain control of the web and surf more securely.
short.cs: Získejte zpět kontrolu nad webem a surfujte bezpečněji.
short.de: Erlangen Sie Kontrolle über das Internet und surfen Sie sicherer.
short.es: Recupere el control de la web y navegue de forma más segura.
short.fr: Reprenez le contrôle du web et naviguez de façon plus sécurisée.
short.hu: Szerezd vissza az irányítást a web felett és böngéssz biztonságosan!
short.it: Riprendere il controllo del web e navigare in modo più sicuro.
short.ja: より安全にウェブやサーフィンの制御を取り戻します。
short.ko: 보다 안전하게 웹 서핑을 제어 합니다.
short.lv: Atgūt kontroli pār WEB, un sērfot drošāk.
short.nl: Herneem controle over het web en surf veiliger.
short.pl: Odzyskaj kontrolę w sieci i surfuj bardziej bezpiecznie.
short.ro: Redobândiți controlul asupra internetului și navigați mai sigur.
short.ru: Возвращает контроль над веб, и серфинг более безопасен.
short.sv: Återta kontrollen över internet och surfa säkrare.
short.zh_TW: 重掌網頁的控制權和更安全地瀏覽。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DJ NoScript provides an extra security for your browser. It allows JavaScript (inline & external) to be executed only by trusted websites of your choice. Some websites are added to the white-list by default, but you can add or remove items at any time.

Important features:
a) Allows you to block all Scripts (inline and external) from untrusted websites (plus you can block Images, Objects, Styles and Media as well).
b) Simple and very lite: this Addon does not use noticeable memory or CPU form your machine.
c) You can easily switch the extension On or Off from the toolbar popup UI using DJ No Script.
d) Add or remove websites to the white-list table easily from toolbar-popup.
e) Beside scripts, you can also block style-sheets, images, objects and media from untrusted sources. To activate, open toolbar-popup and click on the desired option at the bottom of the panel.
f) Choose desired blocking engine, Web-Request-Observer or Content-Security-Policy from the options page.
g) Add desired whitelist or blacklist rules with regular expressions.
